cookieBanner.description: We use essential cookies to keep your session secure, remember your language, and save your theme. We also use optional cookies for security purposes (like CAPTCHA) to protect our platform.

privacyPolicy.text:
The data controller for Qarint Junior is Qarint.

We collect minimal data, such as basic profile information and learning progress, strictly to support and personalize your child's educational journey.

Data is kept only as long as the account remains active. Parents have full rights to review, manage, or request the deletion of their child's data at any time.

We do not sell your data. We use trusted, secure third-party services like Supabase for database management and Cloudflare for security infrastructure.

termsOfUse.text:

parentInfo.point0: All content is aligned with Cambridge YLE standards and carefully tailored for children aged 4-12.
